author.name: Conchobar mac Dubhthach
author.description: An Irish bard of yore, who weaves dulcet melodies that capture hearts with tender love songs. With a quill dipped in courtly love, he pens metaphors of devotion, igniting the flames of passion in every soul who hears his verse.

newsMedieval:
In yon fair land where dwells the artful ones,
Evolution Equity seeks to guard the realm,
Their noble trade of cyber-battles won,
Thus forming bulwark 'gainst the shadows' helm.

From verdant shores of Florida they flee,
Wise elders find new sun in southern clime,
In quest of blissful ease and living free,
A haven found, where golden years may chime.

In far Cathay, a potent liquor flows,
Its maker, bold, doth bring the news of gory,
From Hong Kong's shores, the wealth doth surely show,
The grandest tale of commerce and its glory.

feedItems.title: Evolution Equity Partners Builds on Cybersecurity Opportunities
feedItems.content: The specialist startup investor expects unsettled markets to spur more digital attacks, driving demand for protection against hacks and hackers.
feedItems.contentSnippet: The specialist startup investor expects unsettled markets to spur more digital attacks, driving demand for protection against hacks and hackers.

feedItems.title: Priced Out of Florida, More Retirees Are Trying This Sunbelt State on For Size
feedItems.content: Seniors are finding that Alabama’s Baldwin County is not only more affordable, but has the same weather and same beaches that make its neighbor a popular retirement destination.
feedItems.contentSnippet: Seniors are finding that Alabama’s Baldwin County is not only more affordable, but has the same weather and same beaches that make its neighbor a popular retirement destination.

feedItems.title: Chinese Liquor Maker Sinks After Serving Up Hong Kong's Biggest IPO in Months
feedItems.content: Hong Kong’s biggest listing so far this year flopped in its trading debut, a troubling sign for a market that has been trying to recover from a long IPO slump.
feedItems.contentSnippet: Hong Kong’s biggest listing so far this year flopped in its trading debut, a troubling sign for a market that has been trying to recover from a long IPO slump.

author.name: Brother Arnulfus
author.description: A Benedictine monk who doth write devotional poems in Ænglish, praising God and the saints. His poems are often humorous, short, and satirical. They often contain metaphors of alcohol, especially wine or ale.

newsMedieval:
Of yon Europæan banks, rejoice!
For they doth splash the cash with mirthful voice,
In eke surprise, methinks 'tis not the usual choice,
Their coffers flow with wine, 'tis time to froth.

In lands afar, whereto Gojek hails,
GoTo and Tokopedia trim their sails,
'Midst cost-saving measures, their net loss quails,
Like precious ale well-sav'd, to thereby wax in wealth.

Mark well, dear brethren, yon Eurozone,
Wherewith the sentiment of coin hath grown,
Yet only slightly 'tis, our goblets shan't o'erflow,
We toast t'moderation, a guiding dimly light.

feedItems.title: The Next Companies to Splash the Cash? European Banks---Really
feedItems.content: Strong first-quarter results from Barclays and Deutsche Bank show the financial rehabilitation of Europe’s top lenders, but investors remain wary.
feedItems.contentSnippet: Strong first-quarter results from Barclays and Deutsche Bank show the financial rehabilitation of Europe’s top lenders, but investors remain wary.

feedItems.title: GoTo Gojek Tokopedia Narrowed Net Loss Amid Cost-Saving Measures
feedItems.content: GoTo Gojek Tokopedia narrowed its net loss in the first quarter as cost-saving measures helped reduce operating costs.
feedItems.contentSnippet: GoTo Gojek Tokopedia narrowed its net loss in the first quarter as cost-saving measures helped reduce operating costs.

feedItems.title: Eurozone Economic Sentiment Ticks Up Only Slightly
feedItems.content: The eurozone’s economic sentiment indicator rose to 99.3 April, from a downwardly revised 99.2 in March, and below forecast, suggesting slowing momentum of an economic revival in the bloc as cost-of-living pressures weigh.
feedItems.contentSnippet: The eurozone’s economic sentiment indicator rose to 99.3 April, from a downwardly revised 99.2 in March, and below forecast, suggesting slowing momentum of an economic revival in the bloc as cost-of-living pressures weigh.

author.name: Guillemette de Ventadour
author.description: A whimsical troubadour from Occitania, who cherishes the company of nature's gentle creatures. She often includes metaphors of goats, dogs, rabbits, and snails in her poetry. Her writing style is terse.

newsMedieval:
In garden vast, where dollar's fate does sway,
A whisper tells of change that blooms anew,
As fleeting Fed signals a pause to stray,
The leaves of green may fall and oft renew.

From wind-swept vines of vent'rous alchemy,
STMicroelectronics bears fruit most fair,
With golden glow, yon earnings seem to flee,
Ascend on wings of pray'rs in crisp spring air.

When sky doth part, the debt ceiling loom,
A murky veil enfolding 'pon our lands,
Yet can we grasp the workings of its gloom,
As rabbits, snails, entwine in life's vast strands.

feedItems.title: Dollar Could Fall Further if Fed Signals Pause in Rate-Rise Cycle
feedItems.content: The dollar could extend its losses as the Fed could signal a pause in its interest-rate rise cycle at its May 3 meeting amid fresh concerns over U.S. regional banks, MUFG Bank said.
feedItems.contentSnippet: The dollar could extend its losses as the Fed could signal a pause in its interest-rate rise cycle at its May 3 meeting amid fresh concerns over U.S. regional banks, MUFG Bank said.

feedItems.title: STMicroelectronics First-Quarter Earnings Rose
feedItems.content: STMicroelectronics reported higher earnings for the first quarter and released revenue guidance for the second quarter and full year.
feedItems.contentSnippet: STMicroelectronics reported higher earnings for the first quarter and released revenue guidance for the second quarter and full year.

feedItems.title: What Is the Debt Ceiling and How Does It Work?
feedItems.content: The U.S. risks failure to pay its debts if Congress doesn’t pass new legislation.
feedItems.contentSnippet: The U.S. risks failure to pay its debts if Congress doesn’t pass new legislation.

author.name: Æthelred the Skald
author.description: A Norse poet who doth regale his audience with tales of gods and heroes, praising their might and prowess. He references Norse mythology and history in his poems. He is known for metaphors involving the sea and the weather and weaponry.

newsMedieval:
In battle fierce and bold, the Russian thunder spoke,
With fiery spear of lightning aimed, on Southern Ukraine's yoke.
As storming sea's relentless waves besiege a threatened shore,
Their pound'r of rock, lay homes to waste, and blood did fill the moor.

From trials and throes, of sickness born, a beacon bright there rose,
Mounjaro gathered strength anew, to strike the vile illness' throes.
Diabetes conquered, thus the weight, like suns' retreat at night,
A saga's triumph gained, for aft' the dark shall come the light.

In world of thought and wisdom's gift, we find the tools we craft,
Memory-chip they forged, and now the skies shall clear, dense fog in past.
Makers strived, their wisdom bright, till slump retreated from sight,
And on the brink of day, behold, the valiant triumph of their might.

feedItems.title: Russian Rockets Batter Residential Area in Southern Ukraine
feedItems.content: A Russian rocket barrage left at least one person dead and almost two dozen injured in the southern Ukrainian city of Mykolaiv after months of relative calm there, as Russian forces continued to push to capture the city of Bakhmut in the east.
feedItems.contentSnippet: A Russian rocket barrage left at least one person dead and almost two dozen injured in the southern Ukrainian city of Mykolaiv after months of relative calm there, as Russian forces continued to push to capture the city of Bakhmut in the east.

feedItems.title: Mounjaro Helps Diabetes Patients Lose 'Meaningful' Weight, Study Shows
feedItems.content: Participants with Type 2 diabetes who were also overweight or obese lost up to 15.7% of body weight
feedItems.contentSnippet: Participants with Type 2 diabetes who were also overweight or obese lost up to 15.7% of body weight

feedItems.title: Memory-Chip Makers Say Recovery Is in Sight After Long Slump
feedItems.content: Samsung expressed optimism that customers will start buying again as their inventories are now depleted and manufacturers are preparing for launches of new smartphones and PCs later this year.
feedItems.contentSnippet: Samsung expressed optimism that customers will start buying again as their inventories are now depleted and manufacturers are preparing for launches of new smartphones and PCs later this year.
